column5: Guest house is newly constructed and furnished, detached from main home. Nestled on the shores of Lake House in a small gated community. Park is a 5 minute walk, but a car is necessary. 5 minute drive to Generation Park, 15 minutes from IAH, and 30 minutes from downtown. Grocery stores, restaurants, movie theater, shopping mall a 5 -10 minute drive from house. Max. 2 overnight guest, no smoking, no pets. Off the street parking.
column8: New Luxurious Guest House on Lake close to IAH
